item.title: Kerberos explained in pictures
item.description: Kerberos is an single sign on authentication protocol, we will try to explain how it works with some hopefully simple diagrams.

item.title: Proof of concept using KafkaStreams and KTables - implementation notes, gotchas and Docker Compose example
item.description: Implementation details from a proof of concept using Kafka Streams and KTables using Clojure and Docker

item.title: Proof of concept using KafkaStreams and KTables
item.description: Exploring how to use KafkaStreams and KTables for building a stateful stream processing application
